reviewText:
This is an incredibly HOT Penthouse video. A classic for sure.
If you like classy, erotic, and super sexy young women in super sexy, erotic outfits and scenes ... THIS is the video for you!

After getting quite a few good Penthouse titles recently, like Tropical Spice, Secret Lives, Secret Desires, Fashions & Fantasies, and Gentlemen's Club, I finally ran across a Penthouse title that didn't quite sizzle.
Even though this is a new 2002 title, the footage from this title originally came out in 1997.  Unfortunately, the video quality is pretty grainy, looking like a VHS master was used to transfer this to DVD.  It has quite a few hardcore pornstars in it, like Lexus Locklear, Lexi Erikson, Nikita and Vicca.  Mason Marconi and Rocki Roads also appeared on this DVD.
Some of these scenes actually looked like they may have been hardcore, but were edited precisely in softcore fashion.
There are 6 scenes here, and each girl appears in two of the same segments.  There were two solo scenes, while the other four scenes had two girls in there.
One scene that was worth watching was a steamy scene between Nikita and Vicca, as they were joined by Lexus halfway through.
If you're a fan of any of the particular girls, it might be worth buying.  I'm not sure what bugged me about this title, whether it was the grainy video quality or that I thought I was buying a title with new footage instead of scenes from 5 years ago.  I ended up selling my copy, as I don't consider this title a keeper.
